ssa-survivor-benefits-child.title: Survivor Benefits for Child
ssa-survivor-benefits-child.headline: Survivor Benefits for Child
ssa-survivor-benefits-child.source.name: Social Security Administration
ssa-survivor-benefits-child.summary: Social Security survivor benefits are paid to a child, stepchild, grandchild, or adopted child of eligible workers.
ssa-survivor-benefits-child.criticalAppl: Only one application is needed to apply for all the benefits offered by SSA.
You are under 18 years old (under 19 years old if you are a full-time student in an elementary or secondary school).
